meanings.definition: The frequencies at which charged particles gyrate around magnetic field lines.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study gyrofrequencies to understand how particles move in magnetic fields.
meanings.sent2: The spacecraft detected the gyrofrequencies of the particles in the magnetosphere.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat imagined tiny particles dancing to the beat of gyrofrequencies.
meanings.sent4: In the world of magnetic fields, gyrofrequencies are like the rhythm that guides the particles' dance.
meanings.sent5: Visualizing gyrofrequencies is like watching a mesmerizing cosmic ballet.

meanings.definition: The frequencies at which particles rotate in a magnetic field.
meanings.sent1: Understanding gyrofrequencies helps predict particle behavior in magnetic fields.
meanings.sent2: The experiment aimed to measure the gyrofrequencies of the rotating particles.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended to be tiny particles spinning at gyrofrequencies in the playground.
meanings.sent4: In the magnetic realm, gyrofrequencies dictate the speed and direction of particle rotations.
meanings.sent5: The concept of gyrofrequencies is like a secret code that unlocks the mysteries of magnetic fields.
